pageContext.claim: “Can you imagine a lottery system? Can you imagine it? We take people based out of a lottery. A lottery. Do you think the country is putting their finest in the lottery? I don't think so.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump often mischaracterizes the U.S. diversity visa lottery. Other countries do not choose people to put "in the lottery." Instead, nearly 15 million self-selected people from countries with low immigration to the United States apply annually for the slim chance to win an invitation to apply for a green card.
